column3: 2018 a suspect was detained in Por Senchey. The suspect
column6: is from the same area.------For reasons not immediately clear
column7: he was arrested for wielding a rather large blade
column8: and has been sent to the court (obviously after 5.22 o’ clock) for further proceedings.------Drugs were involved in whatever it was was he had the sword and was thus lifted for.------https://scontent.fpnh5-2.fna.fbcdn.net/v/t1.0-9/41202468_2194582310799954_8886566224830398464_n.jpg?_nc_cat=0&oh=2dc10adde8dfa22329ae1bfce291c361&oe=5C200393
